meeting_notes: Weekly leadership meeting Jan 30th: Discussed major focus on European market expansion through localized content. Product team presented progress on AI education platform improvements - seeing early signs of increased engagement. Barry consulting partnership progressing well with first client transformations showing strong ROI. Marketing performance solid but need breakthrough innovation. Key decision: prioritize European expansion over other geographic markets. Action items: accelerate German content localization, implement personalized learning paths by April, establish consulting methodology documentation. Concerns raised about email marketing being too static - need more dynamic approaches.

projects.name: European Market Localization
projects.description: Localizing content and platform for German, French, Spanish markets

projects.name: AI Education Platform Enhancement
projects.description: Improving course completion rates through personalized learning and adaptive assessments

projects.name: Barry Consulting Framework
projects.description: Developing standardized consulting methodology and certification program

projects.name: Mobile App Redesign
projects.description: Complete UI/UX overhaul of mobile learning app

projects.name: Email Marketing Automation
projects.description: Ongoing email campaign management and optimization

strategy.mission: Empower people to live extraordinary lives through transformational education
strategy.vision: Create a world where personal growth is accessible to everyone everywhere
goals: Become the #1 personal development platform globally
Expand to serve 50 million students worldwide
Establish market leadership in AI-powered personalized learning
Build sustainable consulting business serving Fortune 500 clients
Create breakthrough innovations in wellness and consciousness education
